title: It's In His Kiss: 11 Authors Share Their Favorite Scenes
description: The passionate struggle against temptation, that breathless anticipation, or the ultimate rush of total surrender . . . Whether you like it sweet or sizzling, Itâ€™s In His Kiss is guaranteed to satisfy. Eleven authors cross time, space, and genres to bring you some of their most provocative scenes. Excerpts and Authors Rush by Beth Yarnall Four Times a Virgin by Suzi Love In Love and War by Tara Mills Love Match by Moriah Densley Banished by Tamara Gill Unlikely by Sylvie Fox The Same But Different by Serena Clarke Finding Jordie by HJ Harley Wicked Paradise by Erin Richards A Chance to Love Again by Callie Hutton Dragon Dawn by Deborah O'Neill Cordes
